results.deck: Vicious Cycle Software is a developer most famous for Dead Head Fred and Eat Lead: The Return of Matt Hazard.
results.description:
Vicious Cycle was founded in 2000 by David Ellis along with four others. Most of their work has been with licensed games. They opened up a separate division for these games called Monkey Bar Games. They have worked on Dora The Explorer games, Flushed Away, Curious George. Their most notable work is Dead Head Fred for the PSP, which was viewed well by critics. Their most recent game is Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon. Vicious Cycle was bought by D3 in 2007.

Games

Robotech Invasion (2004)

Spy vs Spy (2005)

Dora the Explorer: Journey to the Purple Planet (2005)

Curious George (2006)

Flushed Away (2006)

Marvel Trading Card Game (2007)

Puzzle Quest (2007)

Dead Head Fred (2007)

Ben 10 Alien Force (2008)

Eat Lead: The Return of Matt Hazard (2009)

Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon (2011)
results.name: Vicious Cycle Software, Inc.

game.name: Eat Lead: The Return of Matt Hazard
Matt Hazard: Blood Bath And Beyond

concept.name: Games That Ask You to "Press Start" But Will Accept Other Buttons
